long_description: The Patagonia Master Chief Hat adds laid-back style to any outifit, whether you're on the trail or in the city. Organic cotton front plus a mesh back help you stay cool and comfortable. Organic cotton canvas brim and crown; polyester mesh back. Internal polyester headband keeps sweat out of your eyes; adjustable rear closure ensures a snug fit.
short_description: The Patagonia Master Chief Hat adds laid-back style to any outifit, whether you're on the trail or in the city. Organic cotton front plus a mesh back help you stay cool and comfortable.
